column5: Just a reminder ,that this weekend , no licence is required to wet a line in Ontario. Just make sure you know yer limits of the catch.  Happy hook,n.
Oh the chaos that is going to insue.  I might go down to the waterfront and watch the natives, lol
I believe theres a kids fishing derby down there.   I,ll be down there,but for the ribs and beer.
Since when have you needed a license to fish?LOL  When is drive without a license weekend?
Trying to remember when they started the resident fishing licences in Ontario, early 70's I'm guessing. Anyone ???
Well, I guess we don't need to carry our outdoors cards this weekend guys. And those with conservation licences can take a full limit.
I am staying away from the water this weekend because of it. I don't need any more stress!
Went to Bronte then i noticed i forgot some stuff so i didnt pull out the line the girlfriend and i Just walked around. Saw only a two familys fishing.
Good weekend for it here...Monomonee are finally in...I should take my nephews out...cept the wind is crazy

youngest son and I went out sunday morning on Simcoe and it was surprisingly quiet . I think wind and cool temps kept most away. we fished big bay to cooks bay with a few average bass and perch to show for it. Mike did have a decent pike on for about 2 seconds LOL hit his shad coloured crank bait boatside .Only a couple of teeth marks to show for it . No pics as I thought I had left my camera and cell behind .  going out again Wednesday morning  TB
